page.title: 19MEMORIES OF 45 YEARS AGO
page.content: I was 10 when the war started.There was a lot of war work in this area. They made bombs and the aircraft to drop them.School then was the{3Rs: Reading,wRiting & aRithmetic.We wore a uniform with thick black stockings.I used to hate 'em.They made my legs itch.The teachers were strict.No wandering round the room.You got a ruler over your knuckles.Work was written on the blackboard.My parents never went anywhere near the school unless I got into trouble. We used to play Tip Cat.You pinched the end of your mother's broom and sharpened each end.After dropping it on the floor you tipped the end with a stick and hit it as far as you could. The greengrocer's cart came round with rabbits hanging on the back.You could buy a decent sized one for sixpence.If you had turkey at Xmas you'd arrived!
